communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Provide records sufficient to show by month, since June 30, 2023 to current:

1. The number of Application for Transportation Service requests, aka "White Forms", submitted.
2. The number of students who have accepted transportation reimbursement stipends for 2023-2024 school year.
3. Special Education Students Missing Active Transportation Request - anonymized aggregated students, type of transportation.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

title: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (South Salt Lake Police Department)

communications.subject: Government Records Access and Management Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (South Salt Lake Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Government Records Access and Management Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: POLICY REQUEST
communications.communication:
Good Afternoon,
Please call for payment of $10.00 for the Policy to 801-412-3603 and we
will email it to you.
Thank you,
Terri

-- 

If you believe this response to your GRAMA request is improper or
inadequate, you may appeal to the following administrative officer: South
Salt Lake City Mayor 220 East Morris Avenue, Suite 200 South Salt Lake,
Utah  84115. To do so, you must file a notice of appeal with that officer
within 30 days of the date of this letter.  Your notice of appeal must
contain your name, mailing address, daytime phone number, and an
explanation of what you want the administrative officer to do.  You may
include a short statement of facts, reasons, and legal authority in support
of your appeal.


*South Salt Lake Police Records*
*2835 S. Main Street*
*801-412-3600*

communications.subject: NYC.gov - NYC.ID Confirm Your Email Address
communications.communication:
You have just created a user account with City of New York. If it was created in error, deactivate your account. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/deactivate.htm?guid=097b4fc319a94a3b97fe183fe0b36572&token=gFNkKSlQTXdJILMIjBmwHKHOtNeUpsdfQdfwvMGcmDFJVmPBEgMMZhNaTsEzLOvj&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv) to confirm your email address. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=097b4fc319a94a3b97fe183fe0b36572&token=gFNkKSlQTXdJILMIjBmwHKHOtNeUpsdfQdfwvMGcmDFJVmPBEgMMZhNaTsEzLOvj&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) Click this link 
If the above link does not work, paste the following address into your browser: https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=097b4fc319a94a3b97fe183fe0b36572&token=gFNkKSlQTXdJILMIjBmwHKHOtNeUpsdfQdfwvMGcmDFJVmPBEgMMZhNaTsEzLOvj&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=097b4fc319a94a3b97fe183fe0b36572&token=gFNkKSlQTXdJILMIjBmwHKHOtNeUpsdfQdfwvMGcmDFJVmPBEgMMZhNaTsEzLOvj&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) 
We ask you to confirm your email to ensure our emails will be delivered. This is the address you will log in with, and the address to which we will deliver all email messages regarding invitations and requests, and other system mail. 
You can change your email address at any time, but will only be able to log in with it once you have confirmed the email address by clicking the link. 
Thank you for using NYC.gov. 
Do Not Reply - Automatic Email

communications.subject: [OpenRecords] Request FOIL-2023-056-16400 Acknowledged
communications.communication:
The New York City Police Department (NYPD) has acknowledged your FOIL request FOIL-2023-056-16400. (https://a860-openrecords.nyc.gov/request/view/FOIL-2023-056-16400) You can expect a response on or about Monday, December 4, 2023. 
Additional Information: Your request has been assigned to Police Officer Lao (646-610-6430). 

Please visit FOIL-2023-056-16400 to view additional information and take any necessary action. (https://a860-openrecords.nyc.gov/request/view/FOIL-2023-056-16400)
